content.rendered:
Directed by Vikramaditya Motwane.

Written by Hardik Mehta.

Cast Rajkummar Rao(Shaurya). Geetanjali Thapa(Noorie). Shiladitya Sen(Roommate 1). Rahul Patel(Roommate 2). Rahul Dutta(Roommate 3). Vishwas(Roommate 4). Girish(Roommate 5). Malay Garg(Broker 1). Rajiv Khanna(Broker 2). Yogendra Singh(Broker 3 (as Yogendra Vikram Singh)). Patrick Graham(Hawk McNab). Hardik Mehta(Desi Hawk McNab). Vivek Soni(Just Dial Telecaller). Anup Rupanwar(Key Maker). R.N. Shukla(Watchman). Khushboo Upadhyay(Girl Next Door).Hawk McNab. Deependra Singh(Paper man)

Language Hindi.

Producers Vikas Bahl. Dipa De Motwane. Karuna Dutt. Anurag Kashyap. Madhu Mantena Varma. Shibasish Sarkar. Ranjan Singh.

Production Phantom Film.
